metadata.title: CVE-2018-11489 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
The DGifDecompressLine function in dgif_lib.c in GIFLIB (possibly version3.0.x), as later shipped in cgif.c in sam2p 0.49.4, has a heap-based bufferoverflow because a certain CrntCode array index is not checked. This willlead to a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11489` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

giflib-tools - 5.1.9-1
libgif7 - 5.1.9-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: giflib package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.9-1').
